summary: Both REQ-1 and REQ-2 are implemented. The backend migration (migration.mo) correctly maps all 'generalCoordinator' roles to 'coordinator' while preserving other fields and roles. The frontend UserManagementPage removes 'Coordenador Geral' from the ROLE_LABELS map and dropdown, and labels.ts removes the deprecated generalCoordinator entry. The Sidebar also removes generalCoordinator from role-gated nav items.
